## About

:::{#about}

Elnaz kabir is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Engineering Technology and Industrial Distribution at Texas A&M University.  Her research is centered on developing and applying advanced analytics to model, optimize, and
strengthen future energy systems under uncertainty. In particular, she focuses on systems that are renewable-rich, electrified, AI-intensive, decentralized, and interdependent across electricity, hydrogen, and supply chain networks.
